entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then freezing rain. Freezing rain mixed with snow overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
